location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Junction of Tigris and Euphrates at Kurna. The smoke is the result of extensive reed-burning in the marshes.' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:176 x 128 mmCondition:The print is in good condition throughout with minor toning/fading at all edgesFoliation:‘29’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of the junction of the Tigris and Euphrates rivers at Kurna. Smoke fills the sky area from right to left as a result of reed-burning in the marshes. A single boat with two standing figures carrying poles is visible in the background.Inscriptions:Ink, alongside image, at right: 'Junction of Tigris and Euphrates at Kurna. The smoke is the result of extensive reed-burning in the marshes.'
